metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:0489-1 -- Recommended update for aaa_base
metadata.description:
This collective update for aaa_base provides the following fixes and enhancements:
* Use of large UID numbers could cause the creation of a huge "faillog" file in /var/log. When logging in as root, the faillog(8) utility could read this file sequentially, introducing long delays. This update removes the call to faillog from the default login scripts. Users interested in keeping this functionality are advised to use the PAM module pam_tally2(8). (bnc#801037) * During system shutdown, blogd(8) could close the system console before all messages were printed. (bnc#789893) * Mime types for .docx, .dotx, .pptx, .xlsx and .xltx were added to /etc/mime.types. (FATE#313237)
